Haku:Susanoo.NAME: SUSANO'OH
Haku:Susanoo.FLAVOR: When this theme was released, 6B was a low.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you play #b3 cards, gain #b1 #yMagatama.

Haku:Susanoo2.NAME: SUSANO'OH II
Haku:Susanoo2.FLAVOR: And people though he was gonna be low tier in CP1.0.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [R] and lose #b1 #yMagatama at the start of each turn.

Haku:BurstIcon.NAME: Burst icon
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add one #yBurst to your draw pile. NL (Cost #b0 - NL Gain #b1 #yIntangible.)

Haku:ContinuumShift.NAME: Continuum Shift
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you enter a #yRest #ySite, upgrade a random card.

Haku:CalamityTrigger.NAME: Calamity Trigger
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you play a card whose cost has been modified, gain 4 #yBlocks.

Haku:ChronoPhantasma.NAME: Chrono Phantasma
Haku:ChronoPhantasma.FLAVOR: 5C > 623AA > J.2C > 2C > 9jc > J.2A > 9jc > Delay J.2C > 5A > 5B > 9jc > J.B2A > 9jc > J.B2A > J.214A
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each battle, gain #yStrength for every #b15HP missing.

Haku:CentralFiction.NAME: Central Fiction
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw #b1 more card at the start of each turn.
